Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 92nd overall pick, by St. Louis in 1970...
Injured on 8/15/1971 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit on 4/18/1973, off Gene Brabender (HOU)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/2/1973, off Tom Hall (SF)...
Injured on 5/29/1978 with a Tender Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drove in 7 runs against Philadelphia on 6/21/1980...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1980, hitting .588 with 1 HR, 10 RBI...
Drove in 7 runs against Atlanta on 9/17/1980...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 7 RBI against Chicago (N) on 7/13/1982...
Injured on 9/3/1982 with a Pulled Achilles Tendon, out for 5 weeks...
